data.actual_result: white text with no background -> you can't read it
data.expected_result: Either the background of the icon should be blurple (like it used to), or text should become dark
data.short_description: Default server icon text is not visible in the mutual servers tab of profile when using light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Set Discord to light theme (User Settings > Appearance > Theme) - Find someone who has a mutual server which doesn't have an icon set (just uses the default text) - Open up their profile - Go to the mutual servers tab - Find that server in the list
